Reminder: We've saved you a Seat at the Elite Eight
Don't miss out on our most MAD promotion for our Loyal Blue partners:
Sell the most solar between now and Selection Sunday and you will win...tickets to this year's Elite Eight game in Boston on Sunday, March 25th!
BONUS POINTS FOR COMMUNITY SOLAR
In addition to a prize for the most loan sales, we will be awarding 2 tickets to the NCAA SWEET SIXTEEN games in Boston on Friday, March 23rd to the partner who sells the most Community Solar Shares.
Note: You must have a signed SSA in place with BlueWave in order to sell Community Solar Shares, please reach out to your BlueWave partner to learn more.
Terms & Conditions:
Sales must be tracked to individual email addresses in Salesforce Mass Solar Loan sales are not eligible for this promotion Minimum of 5 loans closed to win Loans closed between 12:00pm (2/13/18) and 11:00pm on Selection Sunday (3/11/18) are eligible We will announce the winning sales rep on Monday, March 12th, 2018 via phone call from your BlueWave partner BlueWave will not cover any associated travel expenses to attend these games Tickets will be in the balcony section, enjoy the experience with the real fans!
Let the Games Begin!
We can't wait to see who wins it all,
- All of us here at BlueWave
